property.name: Comment
property.descrip: Some key file formats allow a comment to be included. This is the comment if present.

property.name: IsDsaKey
property.descrip: _TRUE_ if the object contains a DSA key. _FALSE_ if the object contains an RSA key.

property.name: IsPrivateKey
property.descrip: _TRUE_ if the object contains a private key. _FALSE_ if it contains a public key.

property.name: IsRsaKey
property.descrip: _TRUE_ if the object contains an RSA key. _FALSE_ if the object contains a DSA key.

property.name: Password
property.descrip: The password to be used when importing or exporting encrypted private keys.

link.text: Use PuTTY Key for SSH Tunnel (PPK Private Key)

method.name: FromOpenSshPrivateKey
method.descrip:
Loads an SSH key from an OpenSSH private-key file format. If the key is encrypted, set the Password property prior to calling this method.

Note: ARG1 is not a filename -- it should contain the contents of the OpenSSH formatted private key. To load from a file, you may first call LoadText to load the complete contents of a text file into a string.

link.text: Load an SSH Key from a File

method.name: FromOpenSshPublicKey
method.descrip:
Loads an OpenSSH public-key from an OpenSSH formatted public-key.

Note: ARG1 is not a filename -- it should contain the contents of the OpenSSH formatted public key. To load from a file, you may first call LoadText to load the complete contents of a text file into a string.

Sample OpenSSH-formatted DSA and RSA public keys are below:

OpenSSH RSA Public Key (Line-breaks are added for readability. An OpenSSH-formatted public key would typically be a single line, not multiple lines.)

Note: ARG1 is not a filename -- it should contain the contents of the PuTTY formatted private key. To load from a file, you may first call LoadText to load the complete contents of a text file into a string.

link.text: Load an SSH Key from a File

method.name: FromXml
method.descrip:
Loads an SSH key from XML.

Note: ARG1 is not a filename -- it should contain the contents of the XML SSH key. To load from a file, you may first call LoadText to load the complete contents of a text file into a string.

Here are RSA public/private keys in XML format: 

_LT_RSAPublicKey>
    _LT_Modulus>x+52s7vvaZ8rT2UdFZWlSUVDHD ... D/m73pYaEJB3Nd7w==_LT_/Modulus>
    _LT_Exponent>JQ==_LT_/Exponent>
_LT_/RSAPublicKey>

_LT_RSAKeyValue>
    _LT_Modulus>vTjHMg1+n.....JHHlPIghw==_LT_/Modulus>
    _LT_Exponent>AQAB_LT_/Exponent>
    _LT_P>zfbbQagHiP48y.....udBR7n5w+MhP7c=_LT_/P>
    _LT_Q>6zCwDGB8ipB....dSEy+BvdVRv9hbE=_LT_/Q>
    _LT_DP>zcNdvlUg2g......9F72NjnAhQUjc=_LT_/DP>
    _LT_DQ>1XB2FIVsA.....qNewUutJKWXcE=_LT_/DQ>
    _LT_InverseQ>qHYYHyZI9d....VuqCeqsMeJ9I=_LT_/InverseQ>
    _LT_D>Ar1Xgk/P1t4fd2Ryr........Onkwwn4Q==_LT_/D>
_LT_/RSAKeyValue>

method.name: GenFingerprint
method.descrip:
Generates a fingerpring for an SSH key. A sample fingerprint looks like this: 
ssh-dss 2048 d0:5f:f7:d6:49:60:7b:50:19:f4:41:59:d4:1f:61:7a

method.name: GenerateDsaKey
method.descrip: Generates a new SSH DSA key that is ARG1 bits in length. The ARG1 should be at least 1024 bits and a multiple of 64. Typical values are 1024 and 2048.

method.name: GenerateRsaKey
method.descrip:
Generates a new RSA public/private key pair. The ARG1 can range from 384 to 4096. Typical key lengths are 1024 or 2048 bits. After successful generation, the public/private keys can be exported in OpenSSH or PuTTY format.

(excerpt from Wikipedia's article on RSA) 65537 is a commonly used value for ARG2. This value can be regarded as a compromise between avoiding potential small exponent attacks and still allowing efficient encryptions (or signature verification). The NIST Special Publication on Computer Security (SP 800-78 Rev 1 of August 2007) does not allow public exponents e smaller than 65537, but does not state a reason for this restriction.

method.name: LoadText
method.descrip: Convenience method for loading an entire text file into an in-memory string.

link.text: Load an SSH Key from a File

method.name: SaveText
method.descrip: Convenience method for saving the contents of a string variable to a file.

_LT_/RSAKeyValue>

class.description: Provides the ability to read and write Putty and OpenSSH format public and private keys. Supports both DSA and RSA keys. Able to generate new keys. Encryption/decryption of keys is supported. Can convert to/from Putty OpenSSH, and XML formats.
